full_summary:
Technical Debt Remediation Initiative (TDRI)
================================ Yaz hakkı

### Call for Tender Information

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a call for tender for the Technical Debt Remediation Initiative (TDRI) to satisfy the requirements of the Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC).

#### Tender Details


| Property Name         |             English Value              | Français Value                                                                                      |
|------------------------|:--------------------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Notice Title           |             RFP G9292-232129 - TDRI  | DP G9292-232129 - Redressement de la dette technique(DRT)                                            |
| Reference Number       | WS3904567095-Doc3981420994          | WS3904567095-Doc3981420994                                                                                                                                                         |
| Amendment Number       | 9                                     | 9                                                                                             |
| Solicitation Number    | WS3904567095                        | WS3904567095                                                                                                                                                              |
| Publication Date        | 2023-08-17                            | 2023-08-17                                                                                             |
| Tender Closing Date    | 2023-10-03 14:00:00                   | 2023-10-03 14:00:00                                                                                          |
| Amendment Date         | 2023-09-28                            | 2023-09-28                                                                                             |
| Expected Contract Date | None                                  | None				                                            |
| Tender Status          | Expired                               | Expired			                                          |
| Goods and Services     | Procurement Category-SRV              | Categorie Approvisionnement-SRV                                                         |
|                        | Applied Labour Market Protective Area| Région Métropolitaine de Ottawa-Gatineau                                                    |

#### Background

The Technical Debt Remediation Initiative (TDRI) is a broader initiative by ESDC to introduce technologies and methodologies to reduce technical debt. The goal of this initiative is to improve the quality of ESDC’s software applications by using infrastructure and service management tools.

#### Key Issues Identified

 ES development continually needs skilled IT Professionals with current domain knowledge in a wide range of technologies to provide software solutions and services to meet the needs of ESDC’s software applications.

#### Solution Approach

ESDC-offers “as and when” requested “terms”–based resources at the following roles labor categories. To provide this SPI service given over for delivery at the location indicated in the “Notice Title Information`.

Key term of contract is combined technical merit and price.
